Package sheet6.a_books

Tests for Sheet 6 Task A: Search with keywords for the pages in a book, where the keyword appeares.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BookSearchTest
    A test for the Interactive Console (Task A)
    This test is based on the test for Sheet 5 Task C.

Package sheet6.a_books Description

Tests for Sheet 6 Task A: Search with keywords for the pages in a book, where the keyword appeares. Run BookSearchTest to test your implementation. A detailed error handling is mandatory and requested by the Task.
